long_description: The Brooks Flyer saddle is made from real leather and is equipped with springs for extra comfort on rough roads. Leather provides natural "give" by stretching and flexing, and because it doesn't need padding, it's a cool option in warm weather. The saddle will age and break in over time. Bag loops permit the use of a traditional English-style touring bag on the rear of the seat.
short_description: The Brooks Flyer saddle is made from real leather and is equipped with springs for extra comfort on rough roads.
